select hh.* from (select rownum as rnum,
h.helper_no as helperNo, h.member_no as memberNo, h.helper_name as helperName, h.helper_category as helperCategory, h.helper_start_time as helperStartTime, h.helper_end_time as helperEndTime, h.helper_ride as helperRide, h.helper_status as helperStatus, h.helper_filepath as helperFilepath, h.helper_intro as helperIntro, h.helper_credit as helperCredit, h.helper_refuse as helperRefuse, (select age from member where member_no=h.helper_no) as age, (select gender from member where member_no=h.helper_no) as gender, decode((select count(*) from bookmark where bookmarker=#{memberNo} and BOOKMARK_CATEGORY=1 and BOOKMARK_NUM=helper_no),'1','좋아요','좋아요취소') as likedCheck from (select helper.* from helper join member on(helper.helper_no = member.member_no) where HELPER_STATUS=1 order by 1 desc )h)hh where rnum between 1 and 3

select * from (select rownum as rnum, h.*, (select count(*)from room where house_no=h.house_no and room_status=1) as roomCount, decode((select count(*) from bookmark where bookmarker=#{memberNo} and BOOKMARK_CATEGORY=2 and BOOKMARK_NUM=h.house_no),'1','좋아요','좋아요취소') as likedCheck from (select * from house where HOUSE_ALLOW=2 order by 1 desc)h) where rnum between 1 and 3
